heading: Cult films.
general-note: Here are entered works on fiction or nonfiction films that acquire a highly devoted but relatively small group of fans after their release. Works on fiction films about a particular subculture in society are entered under the heading. Subculture films,. subdivided by the appropriate geographic, topical, and/or form subdivisions..
This heading is not used for individual cult films. Individual cult films are entered under headings appropriate to the content, genre, and/or form of the film..
